title: Integrative Medicine
description: Learn how Saint Joseph Medial Center offers integrative medicine proven effective in supporting cancer patients along with traditional cancer treatments.
cleaned_text: With our comprehensive approach, the Disney Family Cancer Center offers complementary integrative medicine therapies proven effective in supporting cancer patients when paired with traditional cancer treatments. These therapies, given through our evidence-based Integrative Medicine program, help patients through conventional treatments, which can often be emotionally and physically draining. By giving patients access to a broad range of proven therapies, we ultimately give them more control over their cancer treatment. The future of cancer care We hope to contribute to the increasing body of research on integrative medicine and demonstrate that patients using complementary therapies experience improved quality of life and better outcomes compared to patients receiving conventional therapies alone. Used in addition to surgery, radiation therapy and chemotherapy, we combine our integrative therapies to develop a personalized and evidence-based treatment program for each patient. These therapies include: - Acupressure - Acupuncture - Hypnotherapy - Sound healing - Qigong group class - Tai Chi group class - Yoga group class - Massage
